API_Description: Indicates whether the text in the span is formatted as superscript.
API_Description_Reason: The property name 'superscript' suggests it controls the superscript formatting of the text within the span.
Returns: A boolean value indicating if the text is superscript.
Returns_Reason: The parameter type is boolean, which implies the property returns a boolean value to indicate the presence or absence of superscript formatting.

type.description: A boolean value to set or get the superscript state of the text.
type.description_reason: The parameter 'type' being boolean suggests it is used to toggle or check the superscript state.
type.type_reason: The parameter is explicitly defined as boolean, indicating it is used to represent a true or false state.
